sense.gloss: running off in the night (to leave one's old life behind, e.g. to get away from debt), moonlight flit, skipping town overnight, upping and leaving under the cover of darkness, midnight vanishing act

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑借金↑↓しゃっきん↓がたまって↑夜逃↑↓|よに↓げ|↑同然↑↓どうぜん↓に↑町↑↓まち↓を↑去↑↓さ↓った。
sdata.e: He was deeply in debt. And he and his family skipped town.
